sqlQuery.name: Characteristics
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pan_name AS name , ancestor_pan_type AS material_type , property , value FROM apidbtuning.InferredChars

sqlQuery.name: Protocols
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT pan_name as name , protocol as protocol_name , property AS protocol_param_name , value FROM apidbtuning.InferredParams

sqlQuery.name: ProcessedSample
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT name , input , nvl(input_material_type, input_isa_type) as input_type , protocol , output , nvl(nvl(output_material_type, output_isa_type), 'Data') as output_type from apidbtuning.sampledownstream

sqlQuery.name: Datasets
sqlQuery.sql: select q.name , q.dataset_presenter_id , dsp.display_name , dsp.category , dsp.summary from apidbTuning.DatasetPresenter dsp , (select distinct sd.name , edp.dataset_presenter_id from apidbTuning.SampleDownstream sd , apidbTuning.ProtocolAppNodeResults panr , study.Study s , study.StudyLink sl , apidbTuning.ExternalDbDatasetPresenter edp where sd.output_protocol_app_node_id = panr.protocol_app_node_id and panr.protocol_app_node_id = sl.protocol_app_node_id and sl.study_id = s.study_id and s.external_database_release_id = edp.external_database_release_id) q where q.dataset_presenter_id = dsp.dataset_presenter_id
